forumNotes.content: My English is not very good,I only wish my friends could understand my Chinese. ![:suda:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/suda.gif) download: [http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c0FNv3a](http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c0FNv3a "External link") Which contains the source code, DEMO ![:dubbio:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/dubbio.gif)

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content:
You can write a short intro in Chinese. It might not be possible for everyone to understand, but I'm sure someone will probably volunteer to help with an English text.

Do you have any screenshots?

Also, you can upload files to [http://reboot.pro/fi...-miscellaneous/](http://reboot.pro/files/category/3-miscellaneous/ "")
